Serialized Form

Class GameDisplay extends JComponent implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

width

int width
The width of the display (in pixels).

height

int height
The height of the display (in pixels).

buffer

BufferedImage buffer
The display's image is first drawn to this buffer, in effect giving us double buffering and reducing flicker. Should never be null.

Class MissileCommandApplication extends JFrame implements Serializable

Class Scoreboard extends JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

score

JLabel score
Displays the current score. Should never be null.

power

JProgressBar power
Displays the current power level. Should never be null.
